messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re:Live and Learn 2004 Conference Update
messages.msgSnippet: ... **If there is, I d love it if it was set up so that we were all more together in the room.  I wasn t comfortable speaking up the way it was, and it was
messages.messageBody:
>>I hope that there will be another "Rules vs Principles" discussion.

**If there is, I'd love it if it was set up so that we were all more
together in the room. I wasn't comfortable speaking up the way it was, and
it was hard to hear what other people were saying. ~Rue


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re:Live and Learn 2004 Conference Update
messages.msgSnippet: I hope that there will be another Rules vs Principles discussion. The one this year was great but only scratched the surface of what I think is a pivotal
messages.messageBody:
I hope that there will be another "Rules vs Principles" discussion. The
one this year was great but only scratched the surface of what I think
is a pivotal concept in Unschooling life. It would be great if there
were more time allotted to it.

Robyn Coburn







[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re:Live and Learn 2004 Conference Update
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/13/2003 9:14:11 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... There will be an early registration discount, but I m still working on the budgeting, etc.,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/13/2003 9:14:11 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

>
> Katheryn, will we get a conference special or a rate for signing up
> early. Sara
>
>
>

There will be an early registration discount, but I'm still working on the
budgeting, etc., then the web site. I'll post information as soon as we've
figured it out.

Kathryn
